title: WANTED BUS FOR 53 OVAL PLUS CASH

posts.content:
its 1953, 1500 single port engine that i had stripped last month and freshened up bu local vw engine builder,

as you can see its slammed with ajustable beam etc,

although it dont need a mot as its mot exempt its has a mot for ten months,,

i have had a 12volt convertion done with new alternator etc etc,

it now has towel rail bumpers ( the original ones come with it),

it has new us spec head lights ( again the original ones come with it),

its has 12 day kenzel clock which is mega rare and i was offered 800 euros for,

it drives great, we drove it from milton keynes two the isle of white and it never missed a beat which is about 300 miles,

it won top ten at diva and vdub island this year,

it has had a photo shoot by dave warren and it will be in hayburner soon,

and i think it will be used for brads calender 2015,

if you look on vzi website i have it up for sale for 9k and i think its worth every penny,

its gets loads of attention every were it go,s it even get videoed driving down the motoway,

i am sure i have missed loads but i am sure you get the picture,

cheers
anyone interested in pics drop me your email address and i will send some
kfsherrock@btinternet.com
Nice looking ride I've got a 67 lhd drive walkthrough spilt on here for sale if interested
Sorry am unable too email pics of my bus as don't have facilities too do so. More than happy too send via txt if u would like give us number. Do have a few people interested already. Many thanks

Alright Ken how's things. Not had phone call or txt from bloke in Kent, so of u would like too txt m ur mobile number mines on my advert be more than happy too send u some pics of bus too see wat u think. Thanks Gump
